name: Third-Party Compromise – Qualification
description:
# 🤝 Third-Party Compromise – Qualification

---

## 🎯 Usage

Quickly assess a compromise affecting a third party to:

* Confirm the nature and scope of the incident
* Identify impacts on your organization
* Prepare coordination and containment measures

### Types of third parties concerned

1. Supplier (notably IT)
2. Client
3. Service provider (e.g., freelancer)
4. Partner (joint venture)
5. Subsidiary (notably in case of recent acquisition or sale, especially if IS are separate)

---

## ⚙️ Prerequisites before starting

* 👥 Available resources: IS admin and security access, knowledge of business processes, emergency contact directory, third-party registry
* 🔑 Possible mobilization of the managed service provider (if IS is outsourced)
* 📝 Actions already taken identified and recorded in this case

---

## 📌 Objectives

1. Confirm the third-party compromise incident
2. Assess the scope of the incident and open a communication channel with the third party
3. Assess impact and urgency of response

---

## 📄 Resource

👉 [Full reflex sheet – INTERCERT-FR](https://www.intercert-france.fr/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/fichereflexe-compromissiontiers-qualification.pdf)

tasks.title: Measure 2 – Assess the scope of the incident and open a communication channel with the third party
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Establish the different links with the third party and communicate with them.

### 📌 Actions

* Define the scope of the third-party compromise
* Define the scope of interaction between the third party and the company’s information system
* Establish communication with the third party (channel depends on the nature of the relationship)
* Assess the incident scope and open communication with the third party

### ✅ Deliverables

* Scope of interaction with the third party determined
* Communication traceability documented in the **activities** of this task

tasks.title: Measure 3 – Assess in parallel the impact of the incident and the urgency to respond
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Determine the impact on the information system.

### 📌 Actions

* Targeted investigation to confirm whether the company itself is compromised
* Assess in parallel the incident’s impact and urgency of response

### ✅ Deliverables

* Impact and urgency determined
* Case severity updated

tasks.title: Measure 1 – Confirm the third-party compromise incident
tasks.description:
### 🎯 Objective

Understand the **contractual/technical** link with the third party.

### 📌 Actions

* Identify the source of the report
* Identify the type of report
* Assess the reliability of the report

### ✅ Deliverables

* Compromise and third party identified
* Relevant information documented in the **activities** of this task
